textBeforeTable: Added new publishers: No Comments » JULIET, Monthly Update, RoMEO RoMEO and JULIET Updates for June 2015 01 Jul We apologize for any inconvenience that this causes. RoMEO, JULIET, FACT and OpenDOAR will be offline between the hours of 6am to 6pm UK time on Saturday 11th July, in order for essential maintenance to be carried out at the Data Centre hosting our servers. No Comments » FACT, JULIET, OpenDOAR, RoMEO Essential Maintenance 09 Jul We will add new groups as and when they are needed. – Europe PubMed Central Funders – Charity Open Access Fund – REF – Research Councils UK We currently have lists for: For example here is the REF group of funders [http://www.sherpa.ac.uk/juliet/index.php?fPersistentID=1060] These groups will now be searchable in their own right, and will provide a list of the participating agencies. Each agency will continue to have its own policy entry, so users can search for the group and then select their specific
